summary: JUNE is a 9-year-old orphan girl who shares her body with an ancient supernatural being whose mission is to destroy mankind to allow nature to prevail on earth.
cast: Casper Van Dien|Victoria Pratt|Eddie Jemison|Addy Miller|Lance E. title: June
